name: Relics
description:
Hi everyone, 
Here's my first project on Unity, keep in mind this is an early prototype that might have some update but I don't think I will release any final version of it.

The main idea was a 3D top-down dungeon crawler where the main character has no power nor weapon that can help him to clean up rooms full of monsters but he can found relics inside every stage of the dungeon that unlock capacities (like slow down the time) but in order to found those, he might have to unlock more doors even tho he don't need to do so in order to go to the upper level.

Controls : 
Z,Q,S,D to move or arrow keys (sorry about that, I'm french).
E to open doors.
Left shift to run
Left mouse button to use time spell (feature not finished, don't spam it !)
